00019 #define SAFE_OPERATION(operation)                               do {operation;} while (0)

00024 #define ROUND(val)                                                              (long)((val) + 0.5)

00030 #define VALIDATE(condition, error)                              SAFE_OPERATION(if (!(condition)) return (error))
00031 
00035 #define VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(condition)                   VALIDATE(condition, eSTATUS_COMMON_INVALID_ARGUMENT)
00036 
00041 #define CLEAR(var)                                                              SAFE_OPERATION(memset(var, 0, sizeof(*var)))
00042 
00048 #define CLEAR_ARRAY(var, size)                                  SAFE_OPERATION(memset(var, 0, sizeof(var[0]) * ARRAY_SIZE(size)))

00061 #define NEW_ARRAY(type, size)                                   (type*)(malloc(ARRAY_BYTE_SIZE(type, size)))

00067 #define DELETE(ptr)                                                             SAFE_OPERATION(free(ptr); ptr = NULL)
00068 
00072 #define CHECK(rc)                                               SAFE_OPERATION(if ((rc) != eSTATUS_COMMON_OK) return (rc))
00073 
00077 #define CHECK_STATUS_BREAK(rc)                                  {if ((rc) != eSTATUS_COMMON_OK) break;}
00078 
00085 #define GET_MEMBER(destination, ptr, member)    SAFE_OPERATION(VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(ptr && destination); *destination = ptr->member; return eSTATUS_COMMON_OK;)
00086 
00093 #define SET_MEMBER(source, ptr, member)                 SAFE_OPERATION(VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(ptr); ptr->member = source; return eSTATUS_COMMON_OK;)

00101 #define CONSTRUCT(pptr, module, ...)                    SAFE_OPERATION ( \
00102                                                                                                         VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(pptr); \
00103                                                                                                         *pptr = NEW(module); \
00104                                                                                                         VALIDATE(*pptr, eSTATUS_COMMON_NO_MEMORY); \
00105                                                                                                         return module ## Init (*pptr, ## __VA_ARGS__); \
00106                                                                                                 )
00107 
00112 #define DESTRUCT(pptr, module)                                  SAFE_OPERATION( \
00113                                                                                                         VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(pptr && *pptr); \
00114                                                                                                         CHECK(module ## Init(*pptr)); \
00115                                                                                                         DELETE(*pptr); \
00116                                                                                                         return eSTATUS_COMMON_OK; \
00117                                                                                                 )
